name: Pet of the Week – Chinook
description: Meet Chinook, a fluffy Siberian Husky/German Shepherd Mix and this week's Pet of the Week. Chinook is very loyal to her human companions but may take a second to warm up to strangers. Once she does, she won't leave your side!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Chinook, a fluffy Siberian Husky/German Shepherd Mix and this week’s Pet of the Week. Chinook is very loyal to her human companions but may take a second to warm up to strangers. Once she does, she won’t leave your side! To adopt Chinook, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
